Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Damen, Roscoe, Western, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Damen, Roscoe, Western, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hoyne.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 59th/Kolmar
ShortDescription: Westbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
